title: Here's a list of 20 articles up to 2021 that focus on recognizing multimodal entailment and detecting semantic alignment. These articles cover various aspects of the topic, including methodologies, applications, and evaluations
**"Multimodal Machine Learning: A Survey and Taxonomy"**
Comprehensive survey on multimodal machine learning, including entailment and alignment
**"Visual Semantic Role Labeling: A Benchmark for Image and Video Scene Understanding"** - R
Discusses visual semantic role labeling, which is crucial for multimodal entailment
**"Aligning Books and Movies: Towards Story-like Visual Explanations by Watching Movies and Reading Books"** - Y
Explores alignment between textual and visual narratives
**"Deep Multimodal Representation Learning: A Survey"**
Survey on deep learning techniques for multimodal representation, crucial for entailment

author.literal: **"VQA: Visual Question Answering"** - S. Antol et al.

title: Introduces the VQA dataset and task, which involves multimodal entailment
**"Learning Visual-Semantic Embeddings for Cross-Modal Retrieval"**
Discusses embedding techniques for aligning visual and textual data
**"From Recognition to Cognition: Visual Commonsense Reasoning"** - R
Introduces a dataset and task for visual commonsense reasoning, related to entailment
**"Multimodal Sentiment Analysis: Addressing Key Issues and Setting Up the Baselines"** - S
Discusses sentiment analysis using multimodal data, relevant for semantic alignment
**"Visual7W: Grounded Question Answering in Images"**
Presents a dataset for grounded question answering, involving multimodal entailment
**"Image-Text Embedding Learning via Visual and Textual Semantic Reasoning"**
Focuses on embedding learning for aligning images and text semantically
**"Deep Multimodal Representation Learning from Temporal Data"**
Discusses temporal data in multimodal learning, relevant for entailment
**"Aligning Visual Regions and Textual Concepts for Semantic-Grounded Image Representations"**
Explores aligning visual regions with textual descriptions

author.literal: **"Multimodal Neural Machine Translation"** - S. Elliott et al.

title: Discusses neural machine translation using multimodal data
**"Visual and Semantic Concept Discovery via Attribute-Based Learning"** - A. Farhadi et al
Focuses on discovering visual and semantic concepts, relevant for alignment
**"Learning to Compose Neural Networks for Question Answering"**
Discusses compositional models for question answering, involving multimodal data

author.literal: **"Multimodal Deep Learning"** - N. Srivastava and R. Salakhutdinov

title: Early work on deep learning techniques for multimodal data
**"Grounded Language Learning in a Simulated 3D World"**
Explores grounded language learning in a 3D environment
**"Visual Semantic Parsing by Learning Across Languages and Vision"**
Discusses visual semantic parsing, crucial for multimodal entailment
**"Multimodal Transformer Networks for End-to-End Video-Grounded Dialogue Systems"** - S. Le et al
Introduces multimodal transformers for video-grounded dialogue
**"Aligning Visual and Textual Concepts for Improved Image Captioning"** - Q
Focuses on aligning visual and textual data for better image captioning
These articles should provide a solid foundation for understanding the current state of research in recognizing multimodal entailment and detecting semantic alignment up to
